name: Dystofarm
description:
"Dystofarm" - Discover a Unique Post-Apocalyptic World

Control a Singular Farmer: Master the unique skills of a farmer in a devastated world. Extract souls from defeated mutated creatures to customize your inventory with unique weapons, shields, and hats.

Explore an Endless World: Start from an idyllic farm and venture into an ever-changing, vast laboratory. Challenges and surprises await at every turn.

Mutated Creatures and Challenges: Confront deadly creatures and overcome obstacles in your quest to uncover the origin of mutations. Only the brave will survive in this transformed world.

A Mystery to Solve: Every step brings you closer to the enigma behind the devastation. Uncover the truth hidden in the shadows.

Unique Customization: Acquire souls from mutated creatures to personalize your farmer. Forge your destiny in a world full of surprises.
